Package com.cafean.utils

Class AcGraceIntf

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cafean.utils.AcGraceIntf
  • public final class AcGraceIntf
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages a local instance of AcGrace which it sends commands though a piped connection.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Creates a new instance of AcGraceIntf
